mapper.select: select board.bno, board.state, board.title, board.write_date, substr(type,1,1) as type, tname as typename from board left outer join type on board.type = type.tcode where writer = #{mno}

select mbr_util.basket, mbr_util.bno, board.state, tname as typename, substr(board.type,1,1) as type, board.title, board.write_date from mbr_util inner join board on mbr_util.bno = board.bno left outer join type on board.type = type.tcode where basket=1 and mno = #{mno};
